issue.title: [Rust] CsvReadOptions should allow file extension to be specified
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9521](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9521). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I would like to query TPCH data using Arrow but the file extension is "tbl" rather than "csv" and there is no way to specify this in Arrow.
